text: Yak dlya stiny, tse nalezhalo dvom syrit·sʹkym khlopchykam po mistu. Pid tse, tam buv skarb shcho nalezhav yim. Tomu, shcho yikhniy batʹko buv spravedlyva lyudyna, vash Lord bazhav, shchob vony pidrosly ta dosyahayutʹ povnoyi syly, todi vytyahayutʹ yikhniy skarb. Takyy myloserdya z vashoho Lorda. YA zhoden z shcho moho vlasnoho volʹovoho aktu. Tse yavlyaye soboyu poyasnennya rechey vy ne mohly lyshytysya v syli
